content: your stitches into knit 2 slipped sts together through the halves leave 1 half on your working back loop needle and place the other half of your st s - stitch es stitches instep on hold on spare tbl - knit through the back loop needle or scrap yarn ws -wrong side of work yo - yarn over => bring the working yarn row 1 rs k across 24 26 28 30 and between the needles and to the front of turn work your work if it s not already there and lift the yarn over your right needle row 2 ws sl1 pw rev yo p across rev yo - reverse yarn over => bring the until 1st left before eor turn work working yarn between the needles and to the back of your work if it s not already row 3 rs yo k across to 1sts before there and lift the yarn over your right the yo turn work needle row 4 ws rev yo p across to 1sts before the yo turn work notes repeat row 3-4 until you have 7 8 9 the sample socks are knitted cuff down in 10 gaps in between the st with yarn size 1 = 48sts to fit foot size 6uk/8us over on each side page 2 foot now you start shaping the second half of knit multiple rounds in stockinette stitch the heel by working longer row and until the gap between your toes closing the gaps we will work those pairs of stitches and yarn overs together for sample socks foot size 6uk/8us i knitted 44 rnds until toe starts row 1 rs yo k across to 1 st before the gap sl1 pw sl1 kw and k those 2sts the best way to know how many rounds to together tbl turn work knit for your foot size is to put your stitches on scrap yarn when you are getting close to row 2 ws sl1 pw p across to 1st the toes and try them on the foot part before the gap p2tog turn work should be knitted until the gap of your toes row 3 rs sl1 pw k across to 1 st or if you prefer you can measure your feet before the gap sl1 pw sl1 kw and k those from back of your heels to start of your 2sts together tbl turn work toes and work by the gauge row 4 ws sl1 pw p across to 1st toe before the gap p2tog turn work round 1 k 1 round repeat row 3-4 until you have closed round 2 k1 ssk knit until 3sts before m all the gaps k2tog k1 m marker k1 ssk knit until 3sts before eor k2tog k1 last heel row rs k across until 2sts left k2tog last 2sts round 3 k all sts knit across the front instep until m and repeat rnds 2-3 until you have 24 26 k2tog the last 2 sts from the
